<p style='text-align: justify'>

I'm an M.S. in Machine Learning student at <a href="https://cmu.edu">Carnegie Mellon University</a>. My research interests are in deep learning and multimodal machine learning. I also enjoy software engineering and math.

<br><br>

I graduated from <a href="https://bits-pilani.ac.in">BITS, Pilani</a> in May 2021 with a B.E. in Computer Science. I've also interned at Adobe Research, India, where I worked on applications of deep learning.

<br><br>

Email: <strong>nihalj [at] cs.cmu.edu</strong>
